Posts.Content: Dec 8, 2008 10:56AM Mmorris wrote: Thank you all for being here. I was dx on Tuesday and return today to discuss my options.  I have decided that I will ask for a bilat and no recon. I have read so many things about muscle lost that I am not willing to change my life enough to compensate for those issues. Example, I read about not being able to canoe,(paddling) That is my leisure activity. My husband and I also remodle houses, I need my muscles.  Thanks again for reinforcing my decision. Marjorie
Posts.Title: reconstruction or not ????? vivianu spar2
